project.description: for each children 1. it's downloading the size report of the latest tag and the size report of one tag before the latest one. 2. compare the two reports and check the size differences between them. 3. push the output of the comparison to artifactory 4. send an email with the result of the comparison of each children that the size differences are not well.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
artifactory_host=artifactory needToSendEmail="False" artifactory_url=https://$artifactory_host/ipp-release/com/ac/ipp/SFB
# get one tag before ${NEWTAG} to compare two newest size_report csv OLDTAG=$(git describe --tags --abbrev=0 ${NEWTAG}^ --first-parent origin/$BUILD_BRANCH | head -n1) echo "OLD TAG == $OLDTAG"
mkdir build
if [[ "$BUILD_BRANCH" == "3.1.0" || "$BUILD_BRANCH" == "3.2" || "$BUILD_BRANCH" == "feature/3.2/media_separation" || "$BUILD_BRANCH" == "feature/3.2/media_separation_device_manager" || "$BUILD_BRANCH" == "feature/3.1.0.199/HTTP_based_Services_Communication" || "$BUILD_BRANCH" == "feature/3.2/media_separation_IGS" || "$BUILD_BRANCH" == "feature/EMS_Client" ]] then
echo "In branch ${BUILD_BRANCH} between tags ${OLDTAG} and ${NEWTAG} the img size is different in the following models:" > emailContent.txt echo -e "\r\n" >> emailContent.txt #get all childs names from the spesific TAG childs=$(cat boards2compile.yml | sed s/.*AUTOPRD=// | cut -d" " -f1 | cut -d"&" -f1) allChilds=($childs) allChildsLength=${#allChilds[@]} for i in `seq 2 $(($allChildsLength-1))` do echo "*****************************************************${allChilds[i]}********************************************************************" #get the Current build NEW CSV REPORT curl -k -u ipp-size-check:ipp-size-check --insecure -fO "${artifactory_url}/${BUILD_BRANCH}/${NEWTAG}/${allChilds[i]}/${NEWTAG}_size_report.csv" || curlHasFailed="True" #get the OLDER CSV REPORT (NEWTAG -1) curl -k -u ipp-size-check:ipp-size-check --insecure -fO "${artifactory_url}/${BUILD_BRANCH}/${OLDTAG}/${allChilds[i]}/${OLDTAG}_size_report.csv" || curlHasFailed="True" # if curl failed to download the report (not running the comparison)
if [[ "$curlHasFailed" == "True" ]] then echo "Failed to download sizeReport from Artifactory to ${allChilds[i]}" >> size_report_${allChilds[i]}.txt curlHasFailed="False" exit 3 else # run comparison between the old csv to the new csv set +e sh scripts/mtds_size.sh size_diff ${OLDTAG}_size_report.csv ${NEWTAG}_size_report.csv RetunedValue=$? set -e
#return 0 if the script succeseded else if failed if [[ $RetunedValue == "0" ]] then echo "${allChilds[i]} img size test passed" else needToSendEmail="True" echo "${allChilds[i]} img size test failed" echo "${allChilds[i]} img size test failed, You can see full report here ${BUILD_URL}artifact/size_report_${allChilds[i]}.txt" >> emailContent.txt echo -e "\r\n" >> emailContent.txt fi if [[ -e size_report.txt ]] then mv size_report.txt size_report_${allChilds[i]}.txt
# mv build/size_diff_report_${allChilds[i]}.txt size_report_${allChilds[i]}.txt
#push the report to artifactory to each children # curl -ks -u ipp-size-check:ipp-size-check -X PUT "${artifactory_url}/${BUILD_BRANCH}/${NEWTAG}/${allChilds[i]}/${NEWTAG}_size_report_result.txt" -T size_report_${allChilds[i]}.txt fi fi done
else echo "ipp Size Checker running only for branches 3.2 and 3.1.0 not for ${BUILD_BRANCH}" fi echo "needToSendEmail=$needToSendEmail" > properties echo "OLDTAG=$OLDTAG" >> properties
